results.deck: Based in Nottingham, England, Linux Game Publishing (LGP) publishes games running on the Linux operating system, and also sponsors the free network library, Grapple.
results.description: Founded in 2001 by Michael Simms LGP focuses entirely on Linux based gaming. In September of 2009 they released the first commercial game that used Nvidia PhysX systems technology.
results.name: Linux Game Publishing Ltd.

concept.name: Subscript or Superscript in the Title
